posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: January 8, 2019 at 10:04 PM#6You can't import images via cmd line syntax if the image isn't already an XML file. BMPs, JPEGs, PNGs, all have to be imported into your Image Pool manually first. Once they've been imported, you can then export them as an XML and import the XML file via cmd line syntax.
